com.groep6.pfor.services

Class Firebase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groep6.pfor.services.Firebase

  • public class Firebase
extends java.lang.Object
    The gateway class to firebase. All direct communication with the Firestore API goes through here.
    Author:
    Owen Elderbroek

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initialize the Firebase link and create a connection to the server

      • requestDocument

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot requestDocument(java.lang.String path)
                                                                      throws NoDocumentException
        Obtain a document from the specified path relative to the firestore root with every document or collection separated by a '/'
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the document relative to the database root
        Returns:
        The requested document
        Throws:
        NoDocumentException - If the document was not available

      • requestCollection

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot[] requestCollection(java.lang.String path)

      • addDocument

        protected static void addDocument(java.lang.String path,
                                  java.lang.Object data)
        Add a DTO to a collection
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the collection where the object should be appended to the list with a random document Id
        data - The data that should form a document entry

      • setDocument

        protected static com.google.api.core.ApiFuture<com.google.cloud.firestore.WriteResult> setDocument(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                                   java.lang.Object data)
        Write a document to a location, document Id is specified as the last entry in the path. Warning, overwrites existing data at that location!
        Parameters:
        path - The location to write the object to
        data - The object to write

      • removeDocument

        protected static void removeDocument(java.lang.String path)
        Remove a document at a given path
        Parameters:
        path - The path that points to the document to be removed

      • docRefFromPath

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentReference docRefFromPath(java.lang.String path)
        Obtains the document reference pointed to by a path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the document
        Returns:
        The reference to that document

      • collRefFromPath

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.CollectionReference collRefFromPath(java.lang.String path)
        Obtains the collection reference pointed to by a path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the collection
        Returns:
        The reference to that collection

      • query

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot[] query(com.google.cloud.firestore.Query query)
                                                                   throws NoDocumentException
        Allows constructing a query and executing it
        Parameters:
        query - The query to perform
        Returns:
        The result of executing the query
        Throws:
        NoDocumentException

      • queryOne

        public static com.google.cloud.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot queryOne(com.google.cloud.firestore.Query query)
                                                                 throws NoDocumentException
        Wrapper for query(Query) method that only returns the first entry.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to execute
        Returns:
        The first result of the query
        Throws:
        NoDocumentException

      • newBatch

        public static com.google.cloud.firestore.WriteBatch newBatch()
        Obtain a new Writebatch
        Returns:
        A new Writebatch object

      • registerListener

        protected static com.google.cloud.firestore.ListenerRegistration registerListener(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                  com.google.cloud.firestore.EventListener<com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> listener)
        Register a listener on a firebase path to be notified when something changes on the remote server
        Parameters:
        path - The path to listen on for changes
        listener - The callback for when something happened
